title: Sovereign AGI Action Registry Definition (M-02)
description: Schema defining the structure of the internal Action Registry, listing all available Capabilities (Target Components), the specific Action Verbs they support, and their full operational definitions (Input/Output schemas, effects, and cost metrics). This registry is the backbone for the Planner (M-03).

^[A-Z][a-zA-Z0-9]+$.description: Definitions for all actions available within a specific target component (Capability).

^[A-Z_]+$.description: Definition of a specific action verb or primitive operation.

status.description: Operational lifecycle status of the action.

side_effects.description: List of system state changes guaranteed or observed upon successful execution.

parameter_schema.description: The JSON schema required for the 'parameters' object (M-01 Intent Input Schema).

egress_schema.description: The JSON schema defining the expected successful return structure (Action Result Output Schema).

cost_metric.description: Approximation of computational or resource complexity (essential for Planner M-03 resource optimization).

is_idempotent.description: If true, calling the action multiple times with the same input yields the same result without unintended state mutation.

is_query_only.description: Indicates if the action is read-only (i.e., NO_MUTATION should be in side_effects).
